short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension monitors all Chrome activity and logs it securely for accountability partners.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accountable2You is an accountability software that monitors your device and keeps you accountable. This accountability extension requires a membership with Accountable2You (www.accountable2you.com). All membership plans come with a 10 day free trial! A membership with Accountable2You allows you to use the software on all your Android, PC, Mac, iOS and Chromebook devices for just one price.
